mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Trautz-Bauzonnet. Unidentified armorial bookplate (crest, with tree and crown), probably that of De Fresne; unidentified monogram bookplate "EM" or "ME." Monogram bookplate of SSB, Silvain S. Brunschwig. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 706.
